headline: Ask HN: What tools do you use to track four key metrics known as DORA metrics*?
description:
I am looking for a self-hosted alternative and find nothing to integrate Jira, Github and Gitlab. Do you know any ready-made solutions? What tools do you use?

* - https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/devops-sre/using-the-four-keys-to-measure-your-devops-performance
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你用什么工具来跟踪被称为DORA指标的四个关键指标*？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你用什麼工具來跟蹤被稱為DORA指標的四個關鍵指標*？
description_zh-Hans:
我正在寻找一个自我托管的替代方案，但没有发现任何可以整合Jira、Github和Gitlab的方案。你知道任何现成的解决方案吗？你使用什么工具？

* - https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/devops-sre/using-the-four-keys-to-measure-your-devops-performance
description_zh-Hant:
我正在尋找一個自我託管的替代方案，但沒有發現任何可以整合Jira、Github和Gitlab的方案。你知道任何現成的解決方案嗎？你使用什麼工具？

* - https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/devops-sre/using-the-four-keys-to-measure-your-devops-performance
